column2: Fouillee, Alfred, 1875. Manuel D'Epictete: Traduction Naigeon Revue avec Introduction et Notes suivi d'Extraits et d'Eclarcissements relatifs a l'Histoire du Stoicisme. Paris: Librairie Classique d'Eugene Belin. (This text is within the public-domain)

Thurot, Charles, 1903. Épictète Manuel Texte Grec: Precede d'une Introduction, accompagne de notes et suivi d'un lexique des mots techniques qui se trouvent dans l'ouvrage. Paris: Librarie Hachette et Cie. (This text is whithin the public-domain)
Epicteti Dissertationes ab Arriano digestae. Epictetus. Heinrich Schenkl. editor. Leipzig. B. G. Teubner. 1916. (This text is within the public domain and can be found in the Perseus Digital Library)
Albert Watanabe, Epictetus: Encheiridion. Carlisle, Pennsylvania: Dickinson College Commentaries, 2020. (This text is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike License)
Albert Watanabe, Epictetus: Encheiridion. Carlisle, Pennsylvania: Dickinson College Commentaries, 2020. (This text is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike License)

Schenkl, Henry, 1916. Epicteti Dissertationes ab Arriano Digestae. Leipzig; B.G. Teubner. (This text is within the public domain.)

These are cross-references between the Encheiridion and the Dialogues of Epictetus as noted by Schenkl. References are to book, chapter, and section of the Dialogues, organized by section of the Encheiridion. This text may also be accessed at https://archive.org/details/ldpd_10922736_000/page/620/mode/2up with more details, including word-by-word correspondence.
